languages.text: "Замолвить за меня словечко, намекнуть на пересмотр завещания... Вы все-таки представитель фон Валанциус, с этим именем на Футфоле считаются. Ну и выяснить, кто таков Фиделио, было бы неплохо".

"Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."
languages.original_text: "Замолвить за меня словечко, намекнуть на пересмотр завещания... Вы все-таки представитель фон Валанциус, с этим именем на Футфоле считаются. Ну и выяснить, кто таков Фиделио, было бы неплохо".

traits.locale_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're the von Valancius' envoy, after all, Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

"Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're the von Valancius' envoy, after all, Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

"Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

languages.text: “替我说说情吧，建议他们重新再看一遍遗嘱……你毕竟是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的特使，而落脚港很尊重这个家族。而且，如果你能查出这个菲迪奥究竟是谁，那也很不错。”
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: “替我说说情吧，建议他们重新再看一遍遗嘱……你毕竟是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的特使，而落脚港很尊重这个家族。而且，如果你能查出这个菲迪奥究竟是谁，那也很不错。”

languages.text: «Hable en mi favor, sugiera que revisen el testamento una vez más... Es un{mf||a} enviad{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius, después de todo, y Paso respeta ese nombre. Y, bueno, lo ideal sería descubrir también quién es Fidelio».
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: «Hable en mi favor, sugiera que revisen el testamento una vez más... Es un{mf||a} enviad{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius, después de todo, y Paso respeta ese nombre. Y, bueno, lo ideal sería descubrir también quién es Fidelio».

languages.text: 「俺の代わりに一言物申して、もう一度遺書を精査するように伝えてほしい…あんたはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の使者で、フットフォールに対してもかなりの影響力がある。あと、ついでにフィデリオって奴の正体も知りたい」
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の代わりに一言物申して、もう一度遺書を精査するように伝えてほしい…あんたはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の使者で、フットフォールに対してもかなりの影響力がある。あと、ついでにフィデリオって奴の正体も知りたい」

languages.text: "Legt ein gutes Wort für mich ein, legt ihnen nahe, das Testament noch einmal durchzugehen ... Ihr seid schließlich {mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte} des Hauses von Valancius, und Footfall respektiert diesen Namen. Und natürlich wäre es auch interessant, herauszufinden, wer Fidelio ist."
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: "Legt ein gutes Wort für mich ein, legt ihnen nahe, das Testament noch einmal durchzugehen ... Ihr seid schließlich {mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte} des Hauses von Valancius, und Footfall respektiert diesen Namen. Und natürlich wäre es auch interessant, herauszufinden, wer Fidelio ist."

languages.text: « Plaidez en ma faveur, suggérez-leur d'examiner le testament à nouveau... Vous êtes, après tout, l'émissaire de la maison von Valancius, un nom que Castel respecte au plus haut point. Il pourrait également être intéressant de savoir qui est ce Fidélio. »
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: « Plaidez en ma faveur, suggérez-leur d'examiner le testament à nouveau... Vous êtes, après tout, l'émissaire de la maison von Valancius, un nom que Castel respecte au plus haut point. Il pourrait également être intéressant de savoir qui est ce Fidélio. »

languages.text: "Beni destekleyin, vasiyeti bir kez daha değerlendirmelerini önerin. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin elçisisiniz sonuçta. Binliman'da bu isme saygıda kusur edilmez. Bir de şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenmek güzel olurdu tabii."
languages.original_text: "Put a word in for me, suggest that they go over the will one more time... You're an envoy of House von Valancius, after all, and Footfall respects that name. And, well, it would be nice to find out who this Fidelio is too."

traits.locale_text: "Bana destek olun, vasiyeti bir kez daha değerlendirmelerini önerin. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin elçisisiniz sonuçta. Binliman'da bu isme saygıda kusur edilmez. Bir de şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenmek güzel olurdu tabii."
